Source

mdl - psychology and data science suite

This library was created at the Institute for Mental Health Research, at the University of Texas at Austin by Semeon Risom, and developed in part by funding of NIMH grant 5R33MH109600-03.

Hsu, K. J., Caffey, K., Pisner, D., Shumake, J., Risom, S., Ray, K. L., . . . Beevers, C. G. (2018).
   Attentional bias modification treatment for depression: Study protocol for a randomized controlled trial.
   Contemporary Clinical Trials, 75, 59-66. doi:https://doi.org/10.1016/j.cct.2018.10.014

For a brief introduction to the ideas behind the library, you can read the introduction. Visit the installation page to see how you can download the package. You can browse the examples to see what you can do with this package, and then check out the API reference to find out how.

To see the code or report a bug, please visit the github repository.
